All Classes

Class Description
AdjustingStatsTest
Class testing the functions changing player or enemy stats.
App
Main class launching the JavaFX application
ApplicationTestBase
This is a sample test class for java fx tests.
BaseObject
Abstract structure for enemy, chest and also item objects.
BottomPanelGame
HBox object filled with all the necessary panels (ListView showing players in the game, Player panel, enemy or chest panel, roll-dice panel) for the game.
BottomPanelMapCreator
HBox object filled with all the necessary panels (Tile panel or Enemy panel, Panel for selected object from ListView) for creating the map.
Chest
Structure for chest objects.
ChestPanel
AnchorPane showing all the important information about currently selected chest.
ChestPanelMapCreator
AnchorPane showing all the important information about currently selected enemy.
CircleObject
Class for creating JavaFX Circle object showing an enemy, a chest or a player added to map.
CombatTest
Class for testing the in-Game combat functions.
ConfirmBox
Class for opening a confirmation box, which must be answered (or closed).
CreateGameWindow
AnchorPane displaying all the important objects connected with events to create players, add them to game and start the game.
DeathKnight
DeathKnight object is a creatable Player object with some predefined stats and values, which makes him unique.
Druid
Druid object is a creatable Player object with some predefined stats and values, which makes him unique.
Enemy
Structure for enemy objects.
EnemyPanel
AnchorPane showing all the important information about currently selected enemy.
EnemyPanelMapCreator
AnchorPane showing all the important information about currently selected enemy.
EnergyPotion
Structure for creating EnergyPotion objects.
Equip
Structure for creating Equip objects.
EquipWindow
AnchorPane showing the equip of currently selected player.
Food
Structure for creating Food objects.
GameEvents
Class defining all the necessary events that need to be added to the map within the Game window.
GameWindow
BorderPane with all the necessary panels for playing the game.
HealthPotion
Structure for creating HealthPotion objects.
Hunter
Hunter object is a creatable Player object with some predefined stats and values, which makes him unique.
Item
Structure for creating item objects.
ItemPanel
AnchorPane showing the currently selected item from the ListView in right panel within the MapCreator window.
ItemTags
Enumerate class to distinguish the game Items
JavaFXJUnit4Application
This is the application which starts JavaFx.
JavaFxJUnit4ClassRunner
This basic class runner ensures that JavaFx is running and then wraps all the runChild() calls in a Platform.runLater().
LoadGame
Class for loading previously created games that are saved in .json files.
LoadGameTest
Class for testing the functions of LoadGame class.
LoadGameWindow
AnchorPane showing ListView of all saved games that can be loaded into Game window.
LoadMap
Class for loading previously created maps that are saved in .json files.
LoadMapTest  
LoadMapWindow
AnchorPane showing ListView of all saved maps that can be loaded into Game window or MapCreator window.
Mage
Mage object is a creatable Player object with some predefined stats and values, which makes him unique.
MapCreatorEvents
Class defining all the necessary events that need to be added to the map within the MapCreator window.
MapCreatorWindow
BorderPane with all the necessary panels for creating various maps.
MapPanel
Map Panel class creating a raw map out of hexagon tiles.
MyLogger
Logger class to implement all setting at one place.
Paladin
Paladin object is a creatable Player object with some predefined stats and values, which makes him unique.
Player
Abstract structure for player objects.
PlayerPanel
AnchorPane showing all the important information about currently selected player.
Priest
Priest object is a creatable Player object with some predefined stats and values, which makes him unique.
PrimaryController  
RightPanelGame
VBox showing ListView of objects that can be added to map within the Game window.
RightPanelMapCreator
VBox showing ListView of objects that can be added to map within the MapCreator window.
Rogue
Rogue object is a creatable Player object with some predefined stats and values, which makes him unique.
RollPanel
AnchorPane showing a picture of 20-sided dice and a Label with last rolled number.
SaveAsWindow
AnchorPane which let the user enter under which name he/she wishes to save the current game/map and saves the game/map after the "save" button is clicked.
SaveGame
Class for saving the current changes in game within the Game window to .json file.
SaveLoadExitPanelMapCreator
AnchorPane showing the 3 buttons "Save map", "Load Map" and "Exit game" connected with events within the MapCreator window.
SaveMap
Class for saving the current changes on created map within the MapCreator window to .json file.
SelectedFromListPanelMapCreator
AnchorPane showing the selected Object from ListView in right panel within the MapCreator window.
SelectedItemPanelGame
AnchorPane showing the selected Item within the Game window.
SelectedItemPanelGameTest
Class for testing the item functions (selling, using and discarding from the game).
SelectedTilePanelGame
AnchorPane showing the selected Tile within the Game window.
Shaman
Shaman object is a creatable Player object with some predefined stats and values, which makes him unique.
ShowSelected
Interface for showing currently selected object in a panel within the MapCreator window or Game window.
StartWindow
Main window menu opened after launching the application.
Terrain
Structure for terrain objects.
Tile
Tile object representing a tile in the map.
TilePanelMapCreator
AnchorPane showing the selected Tile within the MapCreatorWindow.
Warlock
Warlock object is a creatable Player object with some predefined stats and values, which makes him unique.
Warrior
Warrior object is a creatable Player object with some predefined stats and values, which makes him unique.
